advprint.desc: Print but will format output, extra tags can also be given as a second-argument in JSON form.

downfile.desc: Downloads a file from a URL. --s: Silent, --f: overwriteExisting, --g: handleGdriveVirusWarn.

fetch.desc: Fetches the content of a URl. --s: Silent, --g: handleGdriveVirusWarn, --b: return as byteString.

list.desc: List out regionalData from the crosshell session. --h: Help.

normfloat.desc: Normalizes dots in float deffinitions, example .1 -> 0.1 and 1. -> 1.0
